title: Baked apples
description: Try this delicious baked apple recipe for a healthy pud, and top it off with a scoop of vanilla frozen yoghurt.Each serving provides 325kcal, 3g protein, 32g carbohydrate (of which 32g sugars), 18g fat (of which 11g saturates), 2g fibre and 0.4g salt.
ingredients: 80g/3oz mixed dried exotic fruit, (such as mango, papaya, banana, fig, golden raisins), chopped
